comment.author: 22168146@N02
comment._content: Bonjour, je suis un administrateur du groupe Montrez vos grues, et nous aimerions beaucoup que vous ajoutiez votre photo à notre groupe.

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content:
When you think how beautiful this ship must have looked under full sail how sad to see her like this.
I look forward NMM to seeing your offerings of some fabulous pictures that you must have stored away in those vaults of yours.  What a treasure trove you must have at your fingertips!
